divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were outside walking across the yard.I noticed a very bright light in the sky almost directly overhead.It was moving faster than an aircraft.It was totally silent,never making a sound.the light was steady until it was halfway across the sky at which point it suddenly dimmed to red.At this point it simply vanished as if a light switch was turned off.There was never any contrail from the object.There was nothing in view to gage size,but I got the impression the object was large. I hold Masters degree's in Physics and Aeronautical Engineering and can state that this object is nothing I am familiar with.It did not behave as one would expect of an aircraft known to our science.

Summary: Ufo crossed sky and just vanished.
